Uses of Package
space.arim.api.concurrent

  • Packages that use space.arim.api.concurrent 
    Package Description
    space.arim.api.concurrent  
    space.arim.api.server.bukkit  
    space.arim.api.server.bungee  
    space.arim.api.server.sponge  
  • Classes in space.arim.api.concurrent used by space.arim.api.concurrent 
    Class and Description
    EnhancedExecutor
    A Executor with upgraded concurrent functionality.
    Scheduler
    A scheduler designed for creating delayed and timed tasks.
    Task
    A task executed by a Scheduler which may be cancelled via Task.cancel()
  • Classes in space.arim.api.concurrent used by space.arim.api.server.bukkit 
    Class and Description
    Task
    A task executed by a Scheduler which may be cancelled via Task.cancel()
  • Classes in space.arim.api.concurrent used by space.arim.api.server.bungee 
    Class and Description
    AsyncExecution
    A service designed for multithreading via asynchronous concurrent execution and scheduling.
    EnhancedExecutor
    A Executor with upgraded concurrent functionality.
    Scheduler
    A scheduler designed for creating delayed and timed tasks.
    SyncExecution
    A service designed for multithreading via asynchronous concurrent execution and scheduling.
  • Classes in space.arim.api.concurrent used by space.arim.api.server.sponge 
    Class and Description
    Shutdownable
    An optionally implemented interface for EnhancedExecutors and/or Schedulers to shutdown any thread pools or resources used in implementations.
